2014/KER/220
HARUN-UL-RASHID, J.
Cri.M.C No.38 of 2014
Dated this the 2 day of January, 2014
ORDER

Petitioners are arrayed as the accused in Crime No.507 of
2013 of Nallalam Police Station, Kozhikode District. The offences
alleged are punishable under Sections 341, 323, 326 and 294(b)
r/w Section 34 of I.P.C.

2. Petitioners are willing to surrender before the Judicial
First Class Magistrate Court-V, Kozhikode. Non-bailable warrant is
pending against them. Now, the petitioners seek a direction from
this Court to consider their application for bail on the date of
surrender itself.

In the facts and circumstances, the Crl.M.C. is disposed of,
directing the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-V, Kozhikode to
consider and pass orders on the bail application on the date of
surrender itself in the event of the petitioners surrendering before
the court below and submitting an application for bail with prior
notice to the Assistant Public Prosecutor within a period of 15 days
from today. The non-bailable warrant issued against the petitioner
shall be kept in abeyance till the disposal of the bail application.

Sd/-
HARUN-UL-RASHID,
Judge.
Scl.
